tool_description: APIs return the movies and series released every week in most of the Streaming Partners like Amazon Prime Video, Netflix, ZEE5, Sony Liv, Disney + Hotstar, Sun NXT and Aha Video
name: OTT Release Updates
title: OTT Release Updates

api_list.name: /posts/previousreleasess
api_list.description:
Sort the results by IMDB rating/date released
Query parameters:
Sorting: sort = date_released/vote_average

These parameters can be applied to all requests

api_list.name: /posts/633c599d546dda989d90b2ff
api_list.description: Get speicifc movie information by Movie Id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ott-release-updates.p.rapidapi.com/posts/633c599d546dda989d90b2ff"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ott-release-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /posts/nextweeks
api_list.description:

in all major OTT platform

api_list.name: /posts/search
api_list.description:
Search from the movie list by movie name / some characters in the movie name
Query parameters:
Search: movieName = 'bim'
